Title: Evil Dead II: Dead by Dawn
Author: Sam Raimi
Scott Spiegel

Replies.Reply: Legend has it, that it was written by the dark ones: NECRONOMICON EX MORTES; Roughly translated...The Book of the Dead.
To trace the origin of the Book, we must go back...back...to a day when spirits ruled the earth.
When the seas ran red with blood.
It was this blood that was used to ink the book.
The Book of the Dead was last seen in 1300 A.D.
It was then that the dark spirits again rose up to battle the living.
It is said that a hero came from the sky.  A man who defeated this evi and buried the Book in the Castle of Kandar.
...Waiting.
And then...
Professor Raymond Knowby and his wife, HENRIETTA, brought the book to a small cabin where they could study it undisturbed.
It was one week later that a group of college students came to the cabin.
It was in the cabin's cellar that they found the Professor's tape recorder, and the Book of the Dead.
One by one, they fell to the possession of the dark spirits.
One man, Ash, destroyed the Book.
But the evil that had been resurrected from it, lives on.
Kanda...Es-trata...Ta-toon...Hazan sobar...Ear-Grets, Gat, ...Nos-feratos ...Amantos...Kanda!
It has only been a few hours since I've translated and spoke aloud the first of the demon resurrection passages from the Book of the Dead.
And now, I fear that my wife has become host to a Kandarian demon.  May God forgive me for what I have unleashed onto this earth.
Annie.
There is a dark spirit here that wants to destroy you.  Your salvation lies in the pages from the Book of the Dead.
Recite the passages.  Dispel the evil.

LINDA, an attractive college student, is waltzing in the semi darkness of the bedroom.  She wears a "Michigan State University" sweatshirt.  She hums melodically to the music as she moves.  Around her neck is draped a delicate silver necklace.
Possessed Linda is coming after Ash.  Ash back peddles, stumbles and falls.
Ash buries Linda's headless body.  He jams a crude wooden burial cross into the earth of the grave.  A bolt of lightning strikes.
Ash, what's that you're playing?
Ow!
I really love it.  I'll never take it off.
DANCE WITH ME!
Please Ash, help me.  I love you, please don't hurt me.
You promised me we'd always be together.  You swore to me!
I'll never take it off.
Our song.
It's gone.
Sun's driven it away...
That's all.  Just a crummy dr-
NO!
Eat chainsaw.
I'm fine... I'm fine...
You bastards.  Give me back my hand.
Give me back my hand!!
Can't... can't be happening.
Who's laughing now?
Who's laughing now!?
Ha!
Wait... I made... a mistake...
N... No.
Let me out!  Let me out!!!
No.
There's something out there.  That...
Nobody goes out that door.  Not till daylight.
Start up that saw and hand it here!
START IT UP!
Maybe something... Something trying to force its way into our world.
We'll all go in together.
If she went out in those woods, she's not coming back.
Felt like someone just walked over my grave.  It's that picture.
He didn't do a very good job.
Why the hell would we want to do that?
If you want to look for her, go ahead.
NO, YOU IDIOT.  You'll kill us all.
No trail.  Which way do you intend to go?
You'll get us all killed.
No.  WAIT!
Listen to me!  I'm all right now.  That thing is gone.
GOD DAMN IT!  I said I was all right!!
You'll be the first to know.
Then let's head down into that cellar...
...And carve ourselves a witch.
Groovy.
Those pages are down there somewhere.
She's playing hard to get...
... rid of.
She got hungry.
Swallow this.
May she rest in pieces.
You didn't finish it?!
Start reciting it.  Now!
Finish it!
No!
You did it.  By God you did it.
For God's sake, how do you stop it?
The vortex is distorting Ash's features as he is rocketed back through the dark void of time.
Kan Da, Es-trata ta-toon hazan sobar ...Ear-Grets, Gat...
...Nos-Feratos...Amantos...Kanda!
Last night Henrietta tried to kill me.
I cannot bring myself to dismember my wife, yet I know that I must, to halt the evil that lives within her.
It is October 1, 4:33 p.m.  Henrietta is dead.  I could not bring myself to dismember her corpse.  But I buried her.
I . . . buried her . . . in the cellar.
God help me, I buried her in the earthen floor of the fruit cellar!
A possessed demon begins to wither and melt. Flesh shrinks away from its skull and dissolves to nothing.
The Book of the Dead is burned to cinders.  The face upon the Book screams as it burns.
Annie!
How'd everything go on the expedition?
So you said in the telegram.  What condition are they in?
Haven't aged a day in three thousand years.
When do we begin the translations?
Should be, but I haven't spoken to him in a week, what with no phone in that cabin.  Take us about an hour to get there.
We'll take my car.
Annie, you hinted in your telegram that your father was on to something with the first part of his translations.  What's the big mystery?  What has he found in The Book of the Dead?
Terrific.  Now what?
That sounds all right.
No.  We thought her -
Somebody's down there with him.
We are the things that were.
Dead by dawn!
We see you!
Hi.
Terrific.  I found the additional pages from the Book of the Dead.
Maybe longer.
Tonight.  Is everything all set with my father?
Maybe nothing.  But just possibly...
Excuse me.  This the road to the Knowby's cabin?
And why not?
What happened?
There must be another way in.
None of your business.
How much?
Tell you what.  You take my bags you got a deal.
Oh my God.  Where are my parents?
What the hell did you do to them?
These are my father's things.
No.
No.  Can't be.
Let him out.
LET HIM OUT!
For God's sake!  That's my mother!
Mother?
No.  No.  I don't know what you are but you're not my mother.
No!
That thing in the cellar is not my mother!
Where are you going?!  HELP US!!  You filthy COWARD!
No.
NO!
It's so quiet.
I'll go with you.
What is it?
In 1300 AD.  This was the "Hero from the Sky," who was prophesized to destroy this Evil.
Here it is.  Two passages.
We've got it!
Recitation of the first passage will make this "Dark Spirit" manifest itself in the flesh.
Recitation of the second passage creates a kind of rift in time and space, and the physical manifestation of this spirit can be forced back through this rift...
She breathes a sigh of relief.
No!
As she pulls Jake's ankle from the door and slams it.
Okay.
Are you sure?
Yeah, but for how long?
Did you find her?
Nos-feratos-allo-memnon-kanda!
No!  I only completed the first of the passages.  And that was to make the evil a thing of the flesh!
There's still the second passage.
Tar-tra Kanda-Estra!  Hudsucker Proxy -- Kanda!
Aton-Neran-Ofas!
Kanda!  Samonda Roba Areda Gyes Indy En-zeen, Nos-Feratos -
Nos-feratos - Amen-non.  Ak-adeem!
....Kanda!

Curtains flutter on the partially boarded windows of the hall.  Ash moves slowly past them and towards the main room ahead.  The gentle creaking sound grows louder.  Ash tosses down the saw and picks up the gun.
I don't think we're "fine".  We're losing it...  starting to slip.  We just cut up our girlfriend with a chainsaw.  Does that sound fine?
The bite marks that Linda's teeth have left in the hand stand out sharply.  The wound suddenly blackens and spiderwebs it's infection across the entire surface of the hand.
Thas' right.  But you ain't goin' there.
Lady, I ain't never seen nothin' like it.
Hey!  I just remembered... Yeah, that's right... There is a trail.
But, it'll cost ya.
Forty Fi...
Hundred bucks.
Sure!
Jesus H. Christ!  I thought she was talkin' 'bout them two goddamn little pieces!
You gonna be alright, honey?
You just sit still fer a minute.
You know this son of a bitch?
We'll throw him in there.
Crazy buck's gone blood simple.
Damn right, you flat mouthed son of a bitch.
It's a trick.  I know it.
Now Bobby, you ain't in no condition.
That's funny.
That trail we came in here on...
What the hell is it?
Hell no, you're the curious one.
Holy Mother O'Mercy.
I ain't got your hand, baby.
Hey.  Bobby Joe's gone!
Where the hell is she?
We gotta go out there and find her!
I'm runnin' the show now.
We're goin' outside into those woods to look for Bobby Joe, an' once we find her, we're gettin' the hell outta here.
You two comin' with me.  I ain't goin' out there alone.
Those pages don't mean shit.
'Sides.  Now you ain't got no, choice.
Now move!
Move you son of a bitch!
Bobby Joe!
Bobby Joe, where are you girl?
Bobby Joe!  Bobby Joe!
Shaddup!
Bobby Joe!
Get the axe.  Kill it.  Kill it.
Sure ain't no, road.
Hell you wanna go there for, anyway?
I don't know.
I hope you rot down there!
Jake, let's beat it the hell out o'here, right now.  I gotta get out!
Jake, I can't take no more of this.
What?
It's in there.
Jake, you squeezing my hand too tight.
Then who...?
Looking up at the open trap door as Ash's body falls through frame.
As he listens intently to the tape playing in the room above.
Henrietta's arm rips through the earth and grabs Ash's leg as he tries to back away.  The corpse that was Henrietta pulls itself from the grave and emits a wail.
Someone's in my fruit cellar!
Come to me.  Come to sweet Henrietta.
Yesssssss.  You and I.  We shall spend eternity together.
But first I'll swallow your soul !
Remember that song Annie?  I used to sing it to you when you were a baby.
Let me out, dear.  It's so cold and dark in here.
Unlock these chains.  Quickly.
Dead by dawn!  Dead by dawn!
Free me!  Unlock these chains!
Come to me.  Come to sweet Henrietta!
Free!  Free at last!
I'll swallow your soul, swallow your soul!
Swallow your soul!
I fear that whatever I have resurrected from this book, is sure to come calling for me.
How can you say that to me Annie?
As he floats about the room.  His laughter suddenly stops and a second demonic voice comes from his body.

Ash exits the frame and we are left with Annie and the stark shadow of possessed Ed which is cast upon the wall behind her.  We watch as the shadow of Ash with the axe, slices through the top portion of possessed Ed's head.  Annie screams as she is splattered with green bile.
As a hand grabs Ash's throat.  Possessed Ed exits frame, revealing it to be Ash's evil hand on his own throat.  It lifts him into the air.
Ash brings the axe down upon Ed's shoulder, knocking him to the floor.  ASH swings the axe again and again.
Ed's missing portion of his head sits upon the floor.
BAHHHH!
We hear the RIP!  And watch as a geyser of blood floods up into the night sky.
448   MEDIUM SHOT - ASH AND ANNIE                           448  Annie and Ash look up to the source of the sound.
JOIN US!
As he moves around the side of the cabin, tearing apart a trellis that stands in his path, and three hanging flowerpots as he approaches the open door.
As he rolls out of the way a moment before the head of the axe buries itself in the wooden floor.  Splinters fly.
Rolls to his feet and stands.  He ducks as Annie enters frame, charging him with axe, screaming.
Catching his wind for a moment.  Then rolls to the side as the axe again comes at him!  SLAM!  The head of the axe slices into the wall only a few inches from his head.
Henrietta turns sharply to Ash with a growl.
Henrietta swoops at Ash as he keeps her at bay with the buzzing chainsaw.
She opens her mouth impossibly wide, exposing those nasty rows of jagged shark like teeth.  She dive bombs him.

Characters.Character: MAGIC BLADE AND GUIDE TRACK RIG

Replies.Reply: Still confused, suddenly she shrieks and the chainsaw comes buzzing through her from behind.  The spinning blade juts out from Henrietta's midsection.
Ash slices and dices.  Henrietta screeches like a wild banshee.
As the B - board of the wall behind Ash falls away revealing battered logs.  The mirror shatters.
A second gnarled tree slams its trunk against the rear door of the cabin.
The entire cabin is surrounded by a group of lumbering oaks.  All working to get in at Ash and Annie.
Ash grabs ahold of the kitchen window ledge so as not to be swept outside by the force of the vacuum of the rift.  Objects and papers fly past him.
Ash is sucked down into the swirling rift.  Like a particle that is swallowed by a deep funnel of draining water.  The rift closed behind him.
We are now within the vortex.  A swirling mass of colors and clouds.  And nightmarish sound effects.
677   OMIT                                                  677   678   CLOSE SHOT - ASH AND WARRIORS                         678  As he looks to the warriors above him.
As he looks to Ash.
